Bob has $2020$ fair $6$ sided dice. Using them, he generates the following expression:
\newline\newline
(Number of ways to get a sum of 2022 from 2020 dice) - (Number of ways to get a sum of 2021 from 2019 dice) + (Number of ways to get a sum of 2020 from 2018 dice) - $\cdots$ + (Number of ways to get a sum of 4 from 2 dice) - (Number of ways to get a sum of 3 from 1 die).
\newline\newline
What is the sum of the digits of the resulting number from simplifying this expression?
